name: Daruga Rocket
description:
It's a game! Play it if you want, I guess.
I got tired of never finishing anything, so I made it as simple as I could so that I could actually get it done instead of giving up after dozens of hours and wasting all that time.
It's a pretty basic shooter with mostly 1-bit assets in space. One life, survive and kill a boss. That's about it.

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys: Movement.
Spacebar: Shoot
Enter: "Use" in the menu

Credits:

1-bit space asset: Yvodlin Paul
8-bit chiptune and sfx jingles: NicoleMarieT
(explosion) Spaceship Shooter Environment: ansimuz
(rocket fire) 'Warped shooting Fx': ansimuz
(eyeball boss + background planet) 'Classic Schmups' pack: DDProject Studio
(ammo bar) Free Space Shoot Em Up Assets Pack: Kraken SIN
Font: M5x7: Daniel Linssen
